title: Certificate in Investment Banking (Online Live)
discription: Investment banking is a specialised area of banking that offers financial advisory services and aids in raising capital for people or businesses.

title: Certificate in Data Visualisation using Microsoft Power BI
discription: Data visualisation is a process that converts raw data into attractive and easy to understand visuals fostering clear communication and smarter decisions.

title: Certificate in Financial Modelling and Valuation (Online Live)
discription: Financial modelling and valuation course is an abstract representation of a real-world financial situation to gauge the performance of a financial asset or portfolio of a business project or any other investment.
